Dragonfly, Giant

This insect resembles a normal dragonfly but is about 5 feet long. Its skin glitters beautifully in the sunlight, belying the danger that the creature represents.



Giant Dragonfly

CR 4

XP 1,200
N Medium vermin
Init +5; Senses darkvision 60 ft.; Perception +1
DEFENSE
AC 18, touch 15, flat-footed 13 (+5 Dex, +3 natural)
hp 45 (7d8+14)
Fort +7, Ref +7, Will +3
Immune vermin traits
OFFENSE
Spd 20 ft., fly 80 ft. (perfect)
Melee bite +11 (1d10+9)
Space 5 ft.; Reach 5 ft.
STATISTICS
Str 23, Dex 21, Con 14, Int -, Wis 12, Cha 6
Base Atk +5; CMB +11; CMD 26 (34 vs. trip)
Skills Fly +13
ECOLOGY
Environment any temperate and warm land
Organization solitary or swarm (2-5)
Treasure none (carapace is worth 1,500 gp intact)


Giant dragonflies appear as normal dragonflies about 5 feet long. Their skin, if it can be removed and preserved, brings a very good price on the market. Giant dragonflies are dangerous predators and hunt humans and other humanoids as prey.

A giant dragonfly is very aggressive and hunts warm-blooded creatures fearlessly. It attacks until either it or its prey is dead.
